name: WAIFU BOT
description: Character Husbando waifus Catcher Group Bot.

LOGGER_ID.description: Support Group's ID And Please Add ur Bot in That group.. with administrator rights

SUDO_USERS.description: Set your best friends id as sudo.

MONGO_URL.description: Add a Mongodb url to store data

API_ID.description: Your Api id... Don't know what is this.. then searchon Google

CHANNEL_ID.description: Your Channel Id.. Where bot will Send.. all Ur Uploaded characters with details

API_HASH.description: Your Api HASH... Don't know what is this.. then searchon Google
